nodes.text: This gang of hoodlums were after Mari - a Rebel courier with a mark on her head. Determined to collect the bounty, they caught her and encircled her. However, they were interrupted by a group of spacers intent on helping her. The gang members and spacers agreed to brawl it out, but, when the gang leader saw that the spacers had defeated his minions, he pulled a blaster on them, only to be attacked out of the blue by Zardra, who disposed of him with her force pike.
